channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Server

item.title: CVE-2023-35898|2024-10-21T14:08:39.521Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information due to an insecure security configuration in InfoSphere Data Flow Designer. IBM X-Force ID: 259352.

item.title: CVE-2024-40705|2024-08-19T20:35:38.600Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server could allow an authenticated user to consume file space resources due to unrestricted file uploads. IBM X-Force ID: 298279.

item.title: CVE-2024-40704|2024-08-15T16:44:10.022Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a privileged user to obtain sensitive information from authentication request headers. IBM X-Force ID: 298277.

item.title: CVE-2024-40705|2024-08-15T16:48:03.025Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server could allow an authenticated user to consume file space resources due to unrestricted file uploads. IBM X-Force ID: 298279.

item.title: CVE-2023-50953|2024-08-02T22:23:44.035Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275775.

item.title: CVE-2023-50954|2024-08-02T22:23:44.104Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 returns sensitive information in URL information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275776.

item.title: CVE-2023-50952|2024-08-02T22:23:44.045Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 275774.

item.title: CVE-2023-50964|2024-08-02T22:23:43.916Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 276102.

item.title: CVE-2023-35022|2024-08-02T16:17:04.193Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a local user to update projects that they do not have the authorization to access. IBM X-Force ID: 258254.

item.title: CVE-2024-35119|2024-08-02T03:07:46.455Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in a stack trace. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 290342.

item.title: CVE-2024-37533|2024-08-02T03:57:39.516Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could disclose sensitive user information to another user with physical access to the machine. IBM X-Force ID: 294727.

item.title: CVE-2024-28794|2024-08-02T00:56:58.335Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 286831.

item.title: CVE-2024-28795|2024-08-02T00:56:58.063Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 286832.

item.title: CVE-2024-28798|2024-08-02T00:56:58.149Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 287172.

item.title: CVE-2024-28797|2024-08-02T00:56:58.104Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable stored to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 287136.

item.title: CVE-2024-40689|2024-07-30T19:53:24.318Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 297719.

item.title: CVE-2024-37533|2024-07-24T17:50:20.072Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could disclose sensitive user information to another user with physical access to the machine. IBM X-Force ID: 294727.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 275774.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 289234.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to read or modify sensitive information by bypassing authentication using insecure direct object references. IBM X-Force ID: 288182.
